body_html:
Is there any reason why this is only implemented like this for the MSE Loss in this case? From the theoretical definition there should just be a division by the sample size.

Nonetheless, sorry for the duplicate and thanks for the answer.

body:
Is there any reason why this is only implemented like this for the MSE Loss in this case? From the theoretical definition there should just be a division by the sample size.

Nonetheless, sorry for the duplicate and thanks for the answer.
